name: Featherfall Judgment
title: Cyno: Featherfall Judgment
in_play_description: When your Cyno, who has this card equipped, uses Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer while having at least 2 levels of Pactsworn Pathclearer's Indwelling effect, DMG dealt by Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer +1. (Max twice per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Cyno to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Cyno, equip this card.
After Cyno equips this card, immediately use Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer once.
When your Cyno, who has this card equipped, uses Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer while having at least 2 levels of Pactsworn Pathclearer's Indwelling effect, DMG dealt by Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer +1. (Max twice per Round)
(You must have Cyno in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
